titles.title: Providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules.
Providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-387, by Mr. Sessions.

It shall be in order at any time on the legislative day of Friday, November 21, 2003, for the Speaker to entertain motions that the House suspend the rules. The Speaker or his designee shall consult with the Minority Leader or her designee on the designation of any matter for consideration pursuant to this resolution.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 132.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 456.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Makes it in order at any time on November 21, 2003, for the Speaker of the House of Representatives to entertain motions that the House suspend the rules.
